level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to issue any rules necessary to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 16-62, the AccessRx Act of 2004, see Mayor's Order 2006-60, June 7, 2006 (53 DCR 5322).
